programme.desc: אנימציה. המשך ללהיט מבית אילומיניישן ('המיניונים'). הצצה נוספת לחייהם הסודיים ומלאי ההרפתקאות של צמד הכלבים מקס ודיוק, ויתר חבריהם חיות המחמד, כאשר הבעלים שלהם לא בסביבה. דיבוב: עידו מוסרי. במאי: כריס רנו. 2019. כ' עב'.

programme.title: מפרץ ההרפתקאות: סרט העל (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות. מטאור קסום מתרסק בעיר ההרפתקאות, והכלבלבים של יחידת החילוץ הופכים לכלבי על! אבל אז נבל העל, המדינגר, בורח מהכלא, מנסה לגנוב את הכוחות ולהרוס את כל העיר. דיבוב: שיר כהן, שיר פרג. במאי: קאל ברונקר. 2023. כ' עב'.

programme.title: לעוף על אפריקה (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. ריצ'רד הדרור הקטן גדל בין חסידות ומשוכנע שהוא חסידה בעצמו. כשחבורת החסידות יוצאת למסע נדידה לאפריקה, ריצ'רד מתעקש לא להישאר מאחור ולצאת איתן להרפתקה של חייו. דיבוב: איתי סולומון. בימוי:טובי גנקל, 2017. כ' עב'.

programme.title: כבשים וזאבים (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה לכל המשפחה. גריי, הזאב החביב, רוצה להיבחר למנהיג הלהקה, ואף מסתכן בכישוף, שלהפתעתו הופך אותו לאיל! מי שבאים לעזרתו הם הכבשים מהעדר השכן. דיבוב: אורי זלצמן. בימוי: אנדריי גאלאט, מקסים וולקוב. רוסיה, 2016. כ' עב'.

programme.title: צוות לעניין (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות מקסימה מהיוצרים של 'צעצוע של סיפור'. בובת תיאטרון חוברת לבובת כלבלב נטושה, וביחד יוצאים השניים להרפתקה בין מציאות לדמיון ברחבי העיר ניו יורק, בה הם הגיבורים הראשיים. דיבוב עב': ניר ברק, יובל בינדר. 2023.

programme.title: המופלאה: הרפתקאות ליידי באג (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות על פי הסדרה האהובה. שני מתבגרים פריזאיים הופכים לגיבורי-העל "חיפושית" ו"חתול שחור", כדי להגן על העיר מפני כוחות הרשע של עש הלילה, הנבל המרושע. דיבוב עב': ספיר דרמון. במאי: ז'רמי זג. צרפת, 2023.

programme.title: בובספוג: הסרט (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. בובספוג ופטריק יוצאים לעיר הצדפה כדי למצוא את הפושע האמיתי שגנב את הכתר ולשחרר את מר קראב ממאסר. דיבוב: עידו מוסרי, לירון ברנס, גלעד קלטר. במאי: סטפן הילנבורג. 2004. כ' עב'.

programme.title: טרולים 3: הקול טוב (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה מוזיקלית, השלישי בסדרת הסרטים המצליחה. פופי מגלה שבילדותו בראנץ' היה חלק מלהקת אחים מפורסמת. לאחר שכנועים החבורה יוצאת להרפתקה מוזיקלית מטורפת לאחד את להקת האחים האבודים. דיבוב: עינת אזולאי, לירון לב. 2023. כ' עב'.

programme.title: חברים דמיוניים (מדובב)
programme.desc: הרפתקאות לכל המשפחה. ילדה צעירה מגלה כי יש לה יכולת מופלאה - לראות במציאות את החברים הדמיוניים של ילדים אחרים. כעת היא מנסה לאחד בין החברים הדמיוניים לילדים, אשר ננטשו עם השנים. עם: ריאן ריינולדס. דיבוב עב': רון לוי. 2024.

programme.title: בגדי המלך הכי חדשים
programme.desc: אנימציה מבית היוצר של HBO. עיבוד קולנועי מוזיקלי חדש לסיפור הילדים הקלאסי "בגדי המלך החדשים", מאת הסופר הדני הנס כריסטיאן אנדרסן. דיבוב: ג'ף דניאלס. במאי סימון ווילצ'ס. ארה"ב, 2018.

programme.title: הצילו! כיווצתי את המורה (מדובב)
programme.desc: קומדיה. פליקס מכווץ בטעות את מנהלת בית הספר הקשוחה לגובה של 15 ס"מ. כשכולם בטוחים שעשה זאת בכוונה, הוא יוצא להרפתקה להוכיח את חפותו ולמנוע את סגירת ביה"ס. במאי: סוון אונטרוואלד. גרמניה, 2015. כ' עב'.

programme.title: השידורים יתחדשו בקרוב
programme.desc: השידורים יתחדשו בקרוב.

programme.title: חבר על ארבע (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. סיפור התבגרותו מחמם הלב של כלבלב קטן בשם ג'וק, אשר נלחם על מקומו בין חבריו הגדולים. במהלך מסע מאתגר בדרום אפריקה, הוא לומד להאמין בעוצמתו הפנימית. דיבוב עברית. במאי: דנקן מקניילי. 2011. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: לעוף על אפריקה (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. ריצ'רד הדרור הקטן גדל בין חסידות ומשוכנע שהוא חסידה בעצמו. כשחבורת החסידות יוצאת למסע נדידה לאפריקה, ריצ'רד מתעקש לא להישאר מאחור ולצאת איתן להרפתקה של חייו. דיבוב: איתי סולומון. בימוי:טובי גנקל, 2017. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: רובינזון קרוזו (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. באי קטן ואקזוטי חי לו תוכי חביב עם חבריו, בע"ח שונים ומשונים. יום אחד, לאחר שהסערה הקשה שככה, הם מוצאים על האי יצור מוזר, רובינזון קרוזו שמו. דיבוב: דניאל מורשת. במאי: וינסנט קסטלוט. צרפת, 2016. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: טד החוקר החופר (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. טד, חוקר הארצות הנודע והמטורלל, יוצא למסע חילוץ מטורף של אהובתו מידיו של מיליונר מרושע. לניסיון החילוץ מצטרפים לטד חבריו בלזוני התוכי וכלבו הנאמו ג'ף. בימוי: דיויד אלונסו, אנריקה גאטו. ספרד, 2017. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: צוות לעניין (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות מקסימה מהיוצרים של 'צעצוע של סיפור'. בובת תיאטרון חוברת לבובת כלבלב נטושה, וביחד יוצאים השניים להרפתקה בין מציאות לדמיון ברחבי העיר ניו יורק, בה הם הגיבורים הראשיים. דיבוב עב': ניר ברק, יובל בינדר. 2023.(n)

programme.title: פלואי גיבור קטן גדול (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה מקסימה. גוזל צעיר אשר חושש ללמוד לעוף נותר מאחור כאשר משפחתו החלה נודדת דרומה בעונת הסתיו. כעת, בעזרתם של חברים טובים, עליו לנסות לצלוח את החורף הקר ולהתאחד שוב עם משפחתו האהובה. איסלנד, 2018. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: לעוף עם ערפד (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. ערפד בן 13 מגיע לכדוה"א לאחר שנמלט מצייד ערפדים. במנוסתו הוא פוגש נער אנושי בן גילו והשניים, שהופכים לחברים, מחליטים להילחם ביחד בצייד. דיבוב: שירלי לילו. בימוי: ריצ'רד קלאוס, קרסטן קילריך. 2017. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: מרמדיוק (מדובב)
programme.desc: קומדיית אנימציה לכל המשפחה. מרמדיוק הוא כלב דני ענק, נאמן ובעל נטייה להסתבך בצרות. לאחר שסרטון בו הוא מצולם הופך לויראלי, מאלף כלבים מפורסם מחליט לקחת את האתגר ולאמן אותו עד אליפות העולם לכלבים! דיבוב עב': עמית יוסוביץ'. 2022.(n)

programme.title: סרט לגו באטמן (מדובב)
programme.desc: סרט אנימציה מצליח. גיבור העל הכי קול שיש צריך להציל את גות'האם ממזימותיו של הג'וקר וחבורתו. להפתעתו (ולמזלו), הוא מגלה שאימץ נער יתום הלהוט לסייע לו במשימה. קולות: מריאנו אידלמן, ניר פרידמן. במאי: כריס מקיי. 2017. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: דורה והעיר האבודה (מדובב)
programme.desc: הרפתקאות לכל המשפחה. דורה החוקרת מהג'ונגל יוצאת יחד עם חבריה החדשים מהתיכון להרפתקת חייה, במטרה להציל את הוריה ולפתור תעלומה מסתורית. עם: איזבלה מונר, אווה לונגוריה דיבוב: בר סביר. במאי: ג'יימס בובין. 2019. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: סדרה של צרות (ג'ים קארי)
programme.desc: פנטזיית הרפתקאות מבריקה בכיכובם של ג'ים קארי, מריל סטריפ ודסטין הופמן. שלושה יתומים עם ירושה עצומה נלקחים לאימוץ על ידי מספר קרובי משפחה ביזאריים, שאחד מהם מנסה להרע להם כדי לקבל את הכסף. במאי: בראד סילברלינג. 2004.(n)

programme.desc: שידור חוזר: ארסנל נגד פריס סן ז'רמן, ליגת האלופות, חצי גמר, משחק ראשון. ארסנל רוצה להגיע לגמר האלופות לראשונה מאז 2006. הברק של סאקה מאיים על פ.ס.ז', שזכתה כבר באליפות צרפת ורוצה להגיע לגמר לראשונה מאז 2020.

programme.title: פ.ס.ז' - ארסנל

programme.title: Burning an Illusion
programme.desc: A black woman living in West London hopes to marry her boyfriend, but finds her life thrown into upheaval when he loses his job and is subsequently arrested after getting into a fight. The experience makes her reassess her priorities, and she decides to reconnect with her African heritage. Drama, starring Cassie McFarlane and Victor Romero Evans.(n)

programme.title: Miranda's Victim
programme.desc: Teenager Patricia 'Trish' Weir is committed to putting her kidnapper and rapist Ernesto Miranda in prison, while her life is wrecked by the legal system. Drama, starring Abigail Breslin, Emily VanCamp and Kyle MacLachlan.(n)

programme.title: She Came To Me
programme.desc: A composer who suffers writer's block rediscovers his passion after an adventurous one-night stand. Writer/director Rebecca Miller's comedy drama, starring Peter Dinklage and Anne Hathaway.(n)

programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club
programme.desc: A man diagnosed with HIV and given 30 days to live discovers that many treatments for his condition are not available in the US. With the aid of a transsexual Aids patient, he sets up a scheme to smuggle the drugs into the country and distribute them to those in need. Fact-based drama, starring Oscar winners Matthew McConaughey and Jared Leto, with Jennifer Garner and Steve Zahn.(n)

programme.title: Oppenheimer
programme.desc: General Leslie Groves Jr spearheads the Manhattan Project to research and develop a devastating weapon capable of ending the Second World War. J Robert Oppenheimer and his colleagues subsequently risk destroying humanity to create an atomic bomb. Christopher Nolan's Bafta and Oscar-winning biopic, starring Cillian Murphy, Robert Downey Jr and Emily Blunt.(n)

programme.title: The Last Rifleman
programme.desc: Artie Crawford is a Second World War veteran who has just lost his wife. On the 75th anniversary of the D-Day landings in Normandy, Artie decides to secretly escape his Northern Ireland care home, and embarks on a journey to France to pay his final respects to his best friend. Drama, starring Pierce Brosnan and Jurgen Prochnow.(n)

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: A US congressman gets embroiled in a secret mission to provide covert military support to rebels in Soviet-occupied Afghanistan. Before long, he finds unlikely allies in the shape of a womanising CIA agent, a Texan socialite and the president of Pakistan. Fact-based political drama set during the 1980s, starring Tom Hanks, Julia Roberts and Philip Seymour Hoffman.(n)

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Empire and France are surrounded by the German army, and face a tense wait for evacuation, during a fierce battle in northern France during the Second World War. Christopher Nolan's wartime drama, which he wrote, directed and produced, starring Kenneth Branagh, Tom Hardy, Mark Rylance and Fionn Whitehead.(n)

programme.title: Miranda's Victim
programme.desc: Teenager Patricia 'Trish' Weir is committed to putting her kidnapper and rapist Ernesto Miranda in prison, while her life is wrecked by the legal system. Drama, starring Abigail Breslin, Emily VanCamp and Kyle MacLachlan.(n)

programme.title: Problemista
programme.desc: An aspiring toy designer from El Salvador attempts to bring his unusual ideas to life in New York. As time runs out on his work visa, a job assisting an erratic art-world outcast becomes Alejandro's only hope of staying in the United States. Comedy, starring Tilda Swinton, and Julio Torres, who also wrote and directed.(n)

programme.title: The Persian Version
programme.desc: Leila, an Iranian-American, is the only daughter of a sprawling immigrant clan living in Noughties Brooklyn. She trembles under the weight of honouring her parents, Ali Reza and Shireen. A lesbian marriage is met with disapproval and Leila channels her anger into a dream of becoming the next acclaimed film-maker. When Ali Reza requires a heart transplant, Leila is reunited with her eight brothers and the rest of the brood. Comedy drama, starring Layla Mohammadi, Bijan Daneshmand, Niousha Noor and Tom Byrne.(n)

programme.title: Wildhood
programme.desc: After discovering that their mother could still be alive, two lads make a run for a better life, finding community, identity and love along the way. Drama, starring Steve Lund and Michael Greyeyes.(n)

programme.title: The Glorias
programme.desc: The story of feminist icon Gloria Steinem's itinerant childhood and its influence on her life as a writer, activist and organiser for women's rights worldwide. Director Julie Taymor's biopic, starring Julianne Moore, Alicia Vikander, Ryan Kiera Armstrong and Lulu Wilson, who all portray Steinem at different points in her life. With Janelle Monae and Bette Midler.(n)

programme.desc: A couple rent a countryside house for a weekend with their parents, but their break is ruined when they discover it's inhabited by a 400-year-old poltergeist. Horror comedy, starring Nik Dodani, Brandon Flynn and Brian Cox.

programme.title: I Saw the TV Glow
programme.desc: Twelve-year-old Owen sees an advert for a new TV show, The Pink Opaque, which airs late on a Saturday night when he is supposed to be in bed. He becomes obsessed with the series, and forges a tentative friendship with older student Maddy. As Owen gets older, he begins to question the blurred line separating reality from fiction. Writer/director Jane Schoenbrun's horror thriller, starring Justice Smith and Brigette Lundy-Paine.

programme.title: Cuckoo
programme.desc: A 17-year-old moves with her family to a resort where things are not what they seem. Writer/director Tilman Slinger's horror thriller, starring Hunter Schafer, Jan Bluthardt and Dan Stevens.

programme.title: Dorian Gray
programme.desc: A naive Victorian man unthinkingly sells his soul for eternal youth, wishing that a portrait of him should age instead. His wish is granted and he is drawn into a life of debauchery by a hedonistic lord, while over the years, the painting becomes increasingly horrific as it reflects his corrupt true nature. Horror, based on Oscar Wilde's novel, starring Ben Barnes, Colin Firth and Ben Chaplin.

programme.title: Minyan
programme.desc: New York City during the 1980s, and a young gay Russian immigrant looks to escape the constraints of his community and find a world teeming with possibilities. Drama, starring Samuel H Levine and Ron Rifkin.

programme.title: Cuckoo
programme.desc: A 17-year-old moves with her family to a resort where things are not what they seem. Writer/director Tilman Slinger's horror thriller, starring Hunter Schafer, Jan Bluthardt and Dan Stevens.

programme.title: Young Soul Rebels
programme.desc: Two pirate radio DJs in 1970s London find their friendship coming to an end as they head in different directions. While one is tempted by the offer of a job with a mainstream station, the other immerses himself in the nascent punk movement - and finds himself accused of murder. Social drama, starring Valentine Nonyela, Mo Sesay, Frances Barber and Sophie Okonedo.

programme.desc: Naveen brings his fiancé Jay home to meet his traditional Indian family, and they come to terms with his white-orphan-artist boyfriend while planning the wedding of their dreams. Romantic comedy, starring Karan Soni and Jonathan Groff.

programme.title: Lady Bird
programme.desc: Golden Globe-winning comic drama, written and directed by Greta Gerwig. Artistic California teenager Lady Bird expects much from life. However, the strained relationship with her mother and failing family finances keep clipping her wings, while early romance leads to heartache. Saoirse Ronan, Laurie Metcalf and Tracy Letts star.

programme.title: My First Summer
programme.desc: Isolated on a remote property after her mother's death, 16-year-old Claudia finds her world transformed when spirited teenager Grace appears. Drama, starring Markella Kavenagh and Maiah Stewardson.

programme.title: Boy Meets Boy
programme.desc: When two young men cross paths in Berlin, a simple afternoon in the big city soon takes on a much greater meaning. Drama, starring Matthew Morrison and Alexandros Koutsoulis.

programme.title: Monsoon
programme.desc: A British-Vietnamese man returns to his birth country for the first time in more than 30 years. He was only eight when he and his family escaped Saigon as boat refugees during the Vietnam-American war. Now he embarks on a personal journey from Saigon to Hanoi to find a place to scatter his parents' ashes. Drama, starring Henry Golding, Parker Sawyers, David Tran and Molly Harris.

programme.desc: As they continue to recover from separate traumatic events, two young men gradually start to fall for each other. Drama, starring Matthew Fifer and Sheldon D Brown.

programme.title: Cicada

programme.title: Nineteen Nineteen
programme.desc: Two former patients of Sigmund Freud meet again and discuss the psychiatric treatment they underwent 65 years earlier. Period drama, starring Paul Scofield and Maria Schell.(n)

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Too Much
programme.desc: An American couple on holiday in Morocco witness the killing of a local man they have befriended. Before dying he whispers a secret that has serious political implications - but they are prevented from telling the police when their son is kidnapped by a gang of spies bent on keeping them silent. Alfred Hitchcock's remake of his own 1934 thriller, with James Stewart, Doris Day, Bernard Miles and Daniel Gelin.(n)

programme.title: Oh! What a Lovely War
programme.desc: First World War musical, comprising a series of satirical sketches highlighting the futility of conflict from the perspective of the ordinary soldiers - many from the same family - and covering famous historical moments, including the Christmas truce. Richard Attenborough's directorial debut, starring Ralph Richardson, Laurence Olivier, John Mills and John Gielgud.(n)

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
programme.desc: A shy, naive lawyer falls foul of a gunslinger while on his way to the backwoods town of Shinbone. His life is saved by a local woman, and he in turn devotes himself to helping the townsfolk while searching for a way to bring the bandit to justice. However, he finally comes to realise that a more aggressive approach will be needed. John Ford's Western, starring James Stewart, Lee Marvin, John Wayne, Woody Strode and Vera Miles.(n)

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Too Much
programme.desc: An American couple on holiday in Morocco witness the killing of a local man they have befriended. Before dying he whispers a secret that has serious political implications - but they are prevented from telling the police when their son is kidnapped by a gang of spies bent on keeping them silent. Alfred Hitchcock's remake of his own 1934 thriller, with James Stewart, Doris Day, Bernard Miles and Daniel Gelin.(n)

programme.title: Ben-Hur
programme.desc: A Jewish prince in first-century Jerusalem is reunited with an old Roman friend, who is now the governor of Judea. However, their differing political views over local dissent leads to a bitter quarrel, and the governor uses the pretext of an accident to sell him into slavery and imprison his mother and sister. Years later, the prince returns, determined to seek revenge and find his missing family. Oscar-winning epic, starring Charlton Heston, Stephen Boyd and Haya Harareet.(n)

programme.title: The Sons of Katie Elder
programme.desc: Four brothers are reunited at their mother's funeral and discover their father was swindled out of his farm and subsequently murdered. However, as they set about avenging his death and reclaiming his land, a crook frames them for killing the sheriff. Western, starring John Wayne, Dean Martin, Earl Holliman, Michael Anderson Jr, James Gregory, George Kennedy and Dennis Hopper.(n)

programme.title: The Cinema List: The 90s
programme.desc: Alex Zane and celebrity film fans go back to the 90s to celebrate some of the decade's greatest films, from classic comedies to epic blockbusters.(n)

programme.title: North Hollywood
programme.desc: A youngster must decide between choosing the future his father wants and following his dream of becoming a pro skateboarder. Confronted with the uncertainty of his future - and how it might impact his friends and family - he takes steps to build relationships with professional skaters in an effort to forge his own path. Comedy drama, starring Ryder McLaughlin, Vince Vaughn and Miranda Cosgrove.(n)

programme.desc: After his facial reconstructive surgery, an aspiring actor fixates on a stage production based on his past. Psychological thriller, starring Sebastian Stan, Adam Pearson and Renate Reinsve.(n)

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: A family tragedy woos Delia Deetz, daughter Lydia and rebellious teenage granddaughter Astrid back to the close-knit community of Winter River. Astrid accidentally opens a portal to the afterlife by summoning Beetlejuice three times. The mischievous demon ricochets between realms, wreaking havoc wherever he goes. Tim Burton's comedy sequel, starring Michael Keaton, Winona Ryder and Jenna Ortega.(n)

programme.desc: Grammy-nominated musician Brinsley Forde stars as Blue, a young reggae DJ chasing his musical ambitions while battling racism in Thatcher-era South London.

programme.title: Nineteen Nineteen
programme.desc: When a former patient of Sigmund Freud sees a TV interview with another of Freud's patients, she decides she has to meet him. Drama with Paul Scofield and Colin Firth.

programme.title: Blade Runner
programme.desc: Theatrical version of Ridley Scott's classic sci-fi thriller, with Harrison Ford as a troubled cop on the trail of fugitive androids. Based on a novel by Philip K. Dick.

programme.title: Friendship's Death
programme.desc: When aliens send a female android diplomat to Earth, she accidentally lands in war-torn Palestine, where she meets a friendly British journalist.

programme.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath Of Khan
programme.desc: Captain Kirk leads his crew in a desperate battle against ruthless arch-nemesis Khan. Sci-fi adventure with the late Leonard Nimoy. Flashing images.

programme.title: Star Trek III: The Search For Spock
programme.desc: The crew of the Starship Enterprise steal their old ship and set out to free the trapped soul of Spock. Sci-fi sequel with WIlliam Shatner. Flashing images.

programme.desc: Mystery thriller based on Dan Brown's forerunner to The Da Vinci Code, starring Tom Hanks and Ayelet Zurer. Catholic leaders turn to Harvard symbolist Robert Langdon, who must put his uneasy relationship with the church hierarc

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: Mystery thriller based on the bestseller by Dan Brown, starring Tom Hanks and Felicity Jones. Renowned symbologist Dr Robert Langdon wakes up in a Florence hospital with a head injury and no memory of the previous 48 hours. However, he soon finds himself hunted and forced to undertake a globe-trotting race against time to prevent the release of a deadly virus capable of killing half the world's po

programme.title: Arthur's Whisky
programme.desc: When Joan's husband dies, she discovers he'd invented an anti-aging elixir that literally takes the years off. Sharing it with her friends Linda and Susan, the rejuvenated women waste little time in painting the town red, but they soon realise it's a very different world to the one they remember. Co-writer/director Stephen Cookson's comedy, starring Diane Keaton, Hayley Mills, Patricia Hodge, Lulu

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 3
programme.desc: Following the death of her father Gus, Toula Portokalos honours his dying wish to take the entire family to his childhood village and reconnect with their Greek roots. Toula's husband Ian joins the madcap expedition along with extended family including her brother Nick and Aunt Voula. Romantic comedy, starring Nia Vardalos and John Corbett.

programme.title: Jules
programme.desc: Residents of a small Pennsylvania town are disturbed when a UFO crashes into a back garden. Director Marc Turtletaub's comedy drama, starring Ben Kingsley, Harriet Harris and Jane Curtin.

programme.title: The Shamrock Spitfire
programme.desc: Co Dublin-born fighter pilot Brendan Finucane, known by his colleagues as Paddy, hones his skills in the RAF during the Second World War, eventually becoming the youngest wing commander in its history. Biographical drama, starring Shane O'Regan, Ryan O'Grady and Sophia Eleni.

programme.title: You've Got Mail
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Meg Ryan and Tom Hanks as the owners of rival New York bookshops. When Joe Fox threatens to put Kathleen Kelly out of business, he shares his misgivings about the impending closure of her store and other personal secrets with an anonymous chat-room partner - and makes a startling discovery that only adds to his dilemma.

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: Romantic fantasy thriller starring Tom Cruise, Cameron Diaz and PenÃ©lope Cruz. After a night of flirtation with the beautiful Sofia, a violent encounter with an obsessive ex-girlfriend leaves playboy David Aames badly disfigured and facing a charge of murder.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: Musical adaptation of Alice Walker's novel, starring Fantasia Barrino and Taraji P Henson. In early 20th-century Georgia, young Celie is forced to marry the tyrannical farmer "Mister". For years, Celie's life is bleak and difficult, but when Mister's mistress, the spirited jazz singer Shug Avery, comes to stay, Celie begins to believe in herself.

programme.title: Get Away
programme.desc: A family's holiday to a remote getaway takes a lethal turn when they discover the island they're on is inhabited by a serial killer. Director Steffen Haars' comedy horror, written by and starring Nick Frost, with Aisling Bea and Sebastian Croft.

programme.title: The Shamrock Spitfire
programme.desc: Co Dublin-born fighter pilot Brendan Finucane, known by his colleagues as Paddy, hones his skills in the RAF during the Second World War, eventually becoming the youngest wing commander in its history. Biographical drama, starring Shane O'Regan, Ryan O'Grady and Sophia Eleni.

programme.title: Hancock
programme.desc: Action comedy starring Will Smith, Charlize Theron and Jason Bateman. The life of superhero John Hancock is on the skids; despite having saved countless lives, he's mostly remembered now for destroying property while flying around drunk. But after he rescues PR executive Ray Embrey from the path of a train, Hancock is offered the chance of repairing his tarnished image.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible 2
programme.desc: Action spy thriller sequel starring Tom Cruise. Impossible Mission Force agent Ethan Hunt is on the trail of his rogue former colleague Sean Ambrose, following the theft of a synthetic virus capable of wiping out the world's population. In an effort to get closer to Ambrose, Ethan is accompanied on the mission by the renegade agent's former lover.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: High school outcasts Janis Sarkisian and Damian Hubbard narrate the tale of 15-year-old Cady Heron, who moves back to America from Kenya with her mother. Janis encourages Cady to infiltrate the Plastics, ruled by the formidable Regina George, but when she does, the clique soon corrupts the new girl. Musical adaptation of the 2004 cult classic, starring Angourie Rice, Renee Rapp, Auli'i Cravalho, a

programme.title: Meg 2: The Trench
programme.desc: Underwater rescue expert Jonas Taylor leads a research team on an exploratory dive into the deepest depths of the ocean. However, a greedy mining operation threatens the team's safety and unleashes a school of voracious 75ft-long megalodon sharks. Director Ben Wheatley's comedy thriller sequel, starring Jason Statham and Cliff Curtis.

programme.title: Madame Web
programme.desc: Superhero action adventure starring Dakota Johnson. While on a dangerous job, New York paramedic Cassie Webb has a near-fatal accident and develops precognitive powers. When she foresees that three young women are in danger, she sets out to protect them from the super-powered villain who wants them dead.

programme.title: Barbie
programme.desc: Satirical fantasy comedy starring Margot Robbie and Ryan Gosling. When blonde and bubbly Barbie experiences a series of sudden crises, she must leave Barbieland to track down her human owner and make things right. But the adoring Ken follows her to Los Angeles where he discovers something called the "patriarchy" and develops some radical ideas...

programme.title: Wonka
programme.desc: Musical comedy prequel to Roald Dahl's Charlie and the Chocolate Factory, starring TimothÃ©e Chalamet. Young Willy Wonka yearns to produce his own confectionary, but finds trouble in the form of a shady cartel of chocolatiers and a mysterious thief.

programme.title: Twisters
programme.desc: Action adventure starring Daisy Edgar-Jones and Glen Powell. Five years after a storm-chasing tragedy involving a group of her friends, meteorologist Kate joins a team investigating unusual tornado activity in Oklahoma. There, they encounter a rival posse of "tornado wranglers" led by the cocky Tyler, who clashes with Kate as the "twisters" intensify.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Action comedy starring Ryan Gosling and Emily Blunt. After a shocking on-set accident, stuntman Colt Seavers is taking some time out from the movie game. But when the lead actor vanishes from a film being directed by his old flame Jody Moreno, Seavers is persuaded to help track down the missing star and finds himself drawn into a disturbing conspiracy.

programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: An apparently unassuming man finds someone very important to him has been scammed and driven to harm. Revealed as a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organisation known as 'Beekeepers', he sets out on a brutal quest of vengeance, hunting those responsible for the incident, who have seriously underestimated how much of a threat he is. Action thriller, starring Jason Statham, Jeremy Iro

programme.title: Mission: Impossible 2
programme.desc: Action spy thriller sequel starring Tom Cruise. Impossible Mission Force agent Ethan Hunt is on the trail of his rogue former colleague Sean Ambrose, following the theft of a synthetic virus capable of wiping out the world's population. In an effort to get closer to Ambrose, Ethan is accompanied on the mission by the renegade agent's former lover.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview: May 2025
programme.desc: A look ahead to the films now playing on Sky Cinema, plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: High school outcasts Janis Sarkisian and Damian Hubbard narrate the tale of 15-year-old Cady Heron, who moves back to America from Kenya with her mother. Janis encourages Cady to infiltrate the Plastics, ruled by the formidable Regina George, but when she does, the clique soon corrupts the new girl. Musical adaptation of the 2004 cult classic, starring Angourie Rice, Renee Rapp, Auli'i Cravalho, a

programme.title: Meg 2: The Trench
programme.desc: Underwater rescue expert Jonas Taylor leads a research team on an exploratory dive into the deepest depths of the ocean. However, a greedy mining operation threatens the team's safety and unleashes a school of voracious 75ft-long megalodon sharks. Director Ben Wheatley's comedy thriller sequel, starring Jason Statham and Cliff Curtis.

programme.title: The Cinema List: British Sky Originals
programme.desc: Not sure what to watch next? Then discover some of the greatest British Sky Originals. From Four Kids and It to SAS Red Notice, there's something here for everyone.

programme.title: Madame Web
programme.desc: Superhero action adventure starring Dakota Johnson. While on a dangerous job, New York paramedic Cassie Webb has a near-fatal accident and develops precognitive powers. When she foresees that three young women are in danger, she sets out to protect them from the super-powered villain who wants them dead.

programme.title: Barbie
programme.desc: Satirical fantasy comedy starring Margot Robbie and Ryan Gosling. When blonde and bubbly Barbie experiences a series of sudden crises, she must leave Barbieland to track down her human owner and make things right. But the adoring Ken follows her to Los Angeles where he discovers something called the "patriarchy" and develops some radical ideas...

programme.title: Wonka
programme.desc: Musical comedy prequel to Roald Dahl's Charlie and the Chocolate Factory, starring TimothÃ©e Chalamet. Young Willy Wonka yearns to produce his own confectionary, but finds trouble in the form of a shady cartel of chocolatiers and a mysterious thief.

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice

Fourth chapter in the action adventure franchise, starring Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Vanessa Hudgens and Ioan Gruffudd.

programme.desc: Action thriller starring Paul Walker and Vin Diesel. programme.desc: A high-school senior (Mary Elizabeth Winstead) and her friends must deal with repercussions of cheating death when they survive a terrible roller-coaster accident.

programme.title: The Front Room
programme.desc: Everything goes to hell for newly pregnant Belinda after her mother-in-law moves in. As the diabolical guest tries to get her claws on the child, Belinda must draw the line somewhere.

programme.title: Chronicle
programme.desc: Three high-school friends make a discovery that gives them incredible superpowers, but their lives spin out of control when their darker sides begin to emerge.

programme.title: Joker
programme.desc: Isolated, bullied and disregarded by society, failed comedian Arthur Fleck begins a slow descent into madness as he transforms into the criminal mastermind known as the Joker.

programme.title: Joker: Folie Ã Deux
programme.desc: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck stumbles upon true love while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Awaiting trial for the murder of five people, Fleck soon discovers the music that's always been inside him.

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: The CIA's most dangerous former operative is drawn out of hiding to uncover more explosive truths about his past.

programme.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: Convinced that Superman (Henry Cavill) is now a threat to humanity, Batman (Ben Affleck) embarks on a personal vendetta to end his reign on Earth, while the conniving Lex Luthor (Jesse Eisenberg) launches his own crusade against the Man of Steel.

programme.title: Knox Goes Away
programme.desc: Diagnosed with a rapidly evolving form of dementia, a contract killer gets the chance to redeem himself by saving the life of his estranged son.

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: A Treasury agent (J.K. Simmons) closes in on a brilliant freelance accountant (Ben Affleck) who works for dangerous criminal organizations.

programme.title: Lost River
programme.desc: A single mother is swept into a dark underworld while her son discovers an underwater town.

programme.title: Companion
programme.desc: A weekend getaway at a remote cabin turns to chaos when it's revealed that one of the guests -- a subservient android built for human companionship -- has gone haywire.

programme.title: Final Destination
programme.desc: Teens meet with horrible ends after a classmate's (Devon Sawa) precognitive vision leads to their ejection from a doomed airliner.

programme.title: Final Destination 2
programme.desc: Death returns to claim the lives of those who did not die in a horrible highway calamity as they were meant to do.

programme.title: Final Destination 3
programme.desc: A high-school senior (Mary Elizabeth Winstead) and her friends must deal with repercussions of cheating death when they survive a terrible roller-coaster accident.

programme.title: The Final Destination
programme.desc: A horrifying premonition saves a young man (Bobby Campo) and his friends from death during a racetrack accident, but terrible fates await them nonetheless.

programme.title: Final Destination 5
programme.desc: When a man's premonition saves them from a fatal bridge collapse, several unfortunate souls learn that Death will not be cheated.

programme.title: I Saw the TV Glow
programme.desc: A classmate introduces teenage Owen to a mysterious late-night TV show -- a vision of a supernatural world beneath their own. In the pale glow of the television, Owen's view of reality begins to crack.

programme.title: Big Eyes
programme.desc: Walter Keane (Christoph Waltz) achieves worldwide fame for pop-art portraits of saucer-eyed waifs, but no one knows that it's his wife, Margaret (Amy Adams), who's the real genius behind the paintbrush.

programme.title: Kicks
programme.desc: A 15-year-old (Jahking Guillory) recruits his two best friends (Christopher Meyer, Christopher Jordan Wallace) to help him retrieve his stolen Air Jordan sneakers from a neighborhood thug (Kofi Siriboe).

programme.title: Maggie
programme.desc: When a deadly zombie virus sweeps the nation, a father stops at nothing to save his infected daughter.

programme.title: Friday After Next
programme.desc: Working as security guards, Craig (Ice Cube) and Day-Day (Mike Epps) run into the thief who stole their Christmas presents.

programme.title: Sixteen Candles
programme.desc: A girl turning 16 likes another girl's guy (Michael Schoeffling) and feels nobody cares about her birthday.

programme.title: The Bank Job
programme.desc: In 1971 London, a car dealer (Jason Statham) and his gang of thieves break into a bank vault and find far more than cash and jewelry.

programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.desc: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while seeking revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family. Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the universe, he must prevent a terrible future only he can foresee.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: While Lex Luthor (Jon Peters) plots against him, the Man of Steel (Brandon Routh) tries to reconnect with Lois Lane (Kate Bosworth) and find his place in a world that learned to survive in his absence.

programme.title: Criminal
programme.desc: Hoping to stop a diabolical plot, the CIA implants the memories and skills of a dead agent (Ryan Reynolds) into the mind of a dangerous convict (Kevin Costner).

programme.title: Lady Bird
programme.desc: A teenager (Saoirse Ronan) navigates a loving but turbulent relationship with her strong-willed mother (Laurie Metcalf) over the course of an eventful and poignant senior year of high school.

programme.title: Shazam! Fury of the Gods
programme.desc: When a vengeful trio of ancient gods arrives on Earth in search of the magic stolen from them long ago, Shazam and his allies get thrust into a battle for their superpowers, their lives, and the fate of the world.

programme.title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
programme.desc: Young Furiosa gets caught in the crossfire of two tyrannical warlords. As the tyrants fight for dominance, Furiosa soon finds herself in a nonstop battle to make her way home.

programme.title: Companion
programme.desc: A weekend getaway at a remote cabin turns to chaos when it's revealed that one of the guests -- a subservient android built for human companionship -- has gone haywire.

programme.title: Unknown
programme.desc: After a serious car accident, a man (Liam Neeson) awakes to find that his wife does not recognize him, that another man has assumed his identity, and that assassins are hunting him.

programme.title: Heretic
programme.desc: A diabolical Mr. Reed ensnares two young missionaries in a terrifying game of cat and mouse when they knock on the wrong door and are forced to prove their faith.

programme.title: Hot Tub Time Machine
programme.desc: Following a night of drinking in a ski-resort hot tub, four pals awake in 1986, getting a chance to rewrite the past.

programme.title: Hot Tub Time Machine 2
programme.desc: The magical hot tub sends Lou (Rob Corddry), Nick (Craig Robinson) and Jacob (Clark Duke) to the year 2025 to prevent an unknown assailant from shooting Lou.

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: Armed with proton packs, four paranormal investigators (Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Harold Ramis) battle mischievous ghouls in New York.

programme.title: Ghostbusters II
programme.desc: Now the parapsychologists (Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd) are trying to rid New York of stress-related pink slime.

programme.title: Your Monster
programme.desc: A soft-spoken actress finds her voice again when she meets a terrifying but weirdly charming monster that lives in her closet.

programme.title: Trap
programme.desc: A man and his teenage daughter realize they're at the center of a dark and sinister event while watching a concert.

programme.title: Barbie
programme.desc: Barbie and Ken are having the time of their lives in the colorful and seemingly perfect world of Barbie Land. However, when they get a chance to go to the real world, they soon discover the joys and perils of living among humans.

programme.title: The Descendants
programme.desc: A man (George Clooney) simultaneously struggles with the decision to pull the plug on his comatose wife while facing pressure from relatives to sell 25,000 acres of unspoiled Hawaiian land.

programme.title: X
programme.desc: A group of actors sets out to make an adult film in rural Texas under the noses of their reclusive hosts, but when the elderly couple catches their young guests in the act, the cast finds themselves in a desperate fight for their lives.

programme.title: Pearl
programme.desc: Trapped on an isolated farm, Pearl must tend to her ailing father under the watch of her mother. Lusting for the glamorous life she's seen in movies, Pearl's temptations and repressions collide.

programme.title: MaXXXine
programme.desc: Aspiring movie star and hustler Maxine Minx finally gets her big break. But as a mysterious killer stalks the starlets of 1980s Hollywood, a trail of blood threatens to reveal her sinister past.

programme.title: Pee-wee as Himself
programme.desc: The definitive story of the artist and performer Paul Reubens and his indelible alter ego Pee-wee Herman.

programme.title: It
programme.desc: Seven young outcasts are about to face their worst nightmare -- an ancient, shape-shifting evil that emerges every 27 years to prey on children. Banding together, the friends must overcome their personal fears to battle the murderous clown Pennywise.

programme.title: It: Chapter Two
programme.desc: Defeated by members of the Losers' Club, the evil clown Pennywise returns 27 years later to terrorize the town of Derry, Maine. Now adults, the united Losers must conquer their deepest fears to destroy the shape-shifting Pennywise once and for all.

programme.title: Assassin's Creed
programme.desc: A descendant (Michael Fassbender) of the mysterious secret society known as the Assassins uses his newfound knowledge and physical skills to battle the power-hungry Templar Order.

programme.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: Convinced that Superman (Henry Cavill) is now a threat to humanity, Batman (Ben Affleck) embarks on a personal vendetta to end his reign on Earth, while the conniving Lex Luthor (Jesse Eisenberg) launches his own crusade against the Man of Steel.
